description: Job represents the configuration of a single job.

status.description: Status is a structure describing current status of a job. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status

spec.description: Spec is a structure defining the expected behavior of a job. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status
